business.headline: No salary paid to Madhabi Buch after retirement: ICICI Bank on Congress's claimMadhabi Buch served as the CEO of ICICI Securities from February 2009 to May 2011. In a statement, the bank said it has not paid any salary or granted any ESOPs to Buch after her retirement, other than her retiral benefits.

RBI: 97.96% of Rs 2,000 notes withdrawn, Rs 7,261 crore yet to returnAs of August 30, 2024, only Rs 7,261 crore worth of these notes remain with the public, according to the data released by RBI on Monday.

IndiGo's gender-specific seating for women travellers sees 60-70% rise in AugustIndiGo launched this gender-specific seating option in May 2024 as a pilot project, aimed at increasing the comfort and security of women travellers.

Government approves Rs 3,300 crore semiconductor unit in Gujarat's SanandThis unit represents India's fifth semiconductor facility and is part of the India Semiconductor Mission (ISM) to build a robust semiconductor ecosystem.

Union Cabinet approves Rs 13,966 crore boost for agriculture, food securityThe decision was made during a meeting chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, with the goal of supporting farming activities and improving the lives of farmers.
Sensex, Nifty close on record high driven by gains in IT and FMCG stocks The S&P BSE Sensex added 194.07 points to close at 82,559.84, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 42.80 points to end at 194.07.

Commercial LPG cylinders to get costlier from today, price hiked by Rs 39The price of commercial LPG cylinders has been increased nationwide, with a Rs 39 hike in Delhi for a 19 kg cylinder, now priced at Rs 1,691.50 as of September 1.

India's IPO frenzy: Why companies are rushing to go publicIn the first half of 2024, while global IPO markets cooled, India's IPO market has been on fire, bucking the trend seen in the US, Japan, and even China.

India's Q1 GDP grows at 6.7%, lowest in 5 quartersQ1 GDP growth: While the 6.7% growth is broadly in line with what experts had estimated, it falls short of the Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) projection of 7.2% for the same period.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Paris 2024: Record-breaker Sumit Antil makes it back-to-back Paralympics goldsRecord-breaker Sumit Antil made it back-to-back gold medals at the Paralympics with a sensational performance in Paris on September 2, Monday.

Rahul Gandhi keen on AAP-Congress alliance in Haryana polls: SourcesCongress MP Rahul Gandhi raised the possibility of his party having an alliance with Arvind Kejriwal-led AAP for the October 5 Haryana Assembly polls during the Congress's Central Election Committee (CEC) meeting, sources told India Today TV.

Bengal anti-rape bill constitutionally valid, but needs President's assent: ExpertsLegal experts said the West Bengal government's move to introduce an anti-rape bill in the state Assembly was constitutionally valid, but it will require presidential assent for it to become a law.

India at Paralympics 2024: Sumit Antil, Nitesh Kumar lead medal rush on Day 5It was a fine day for India at the Paris Paralympics on September 2, Monday as Sumit Antil and Nitesh Kumar claimed gold medals. India bagged a total of 8 medals on the day.

Can skincare therapy really improve your mental health?Skincare is more than just applying a few products on your skin to achieve that flawless glow. It can have a significant impact on your mental well-being.

BJP on Nitesh Rane's anti-Muslim remarks: 'Such words have no space in public life'Participating in a debate on India Today TV, BJP spokesperson Tuhin Sinha condemned Nitesh Rane's recent remarks where the latter openly threatened the Muslim community.

Sandip Ghosh, ex-principal of Kolkata's RG Kar hospital, arrested by CBISandip Ghosh has been arrested by the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) for his alleged involvement in the financial irregularities in Kolkata's RG Kar hospital.

Sebi chief was drawing salary from ICICI, Congress alleges, bank denies claimThe Congress claimed that Madhabi Puri Buch received an income of Rs 16.8 crore from ICICI since joining Sebi in 2017, which is 5.09 times her Sebi income of Rs 3.3 crore during the same period.
Pics: Deepika's pregnancy shoot with Ranveer is all about that joyDeepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh's pregnancy photoshoot is here. The couple look stunning in the black-and-white images.

Sathyabama welcomes the Yorker Champion Jasprit BumrahIn a memorable event, Sathyabama University had the honour of hosting one of India's most celebrated cricket icons, Mr. Jasprit Bumrah. The university's President, Dr. Marie Johnson, and Chancellor, Dr. Mariazeena Johnson, warmly welcomed the champion fast bowler, renowned for his impeccable yorkers, to the campus.

The atmosphere was electric as students gathered in large numbers, eager to catch a glimpse of the cricket sensation. Their excitement and enthusiasm were palpable, reflecting the immense respect and admiration they hold for Bumrah. His visit not only inspired the students but also created an unforgettable experience, further strengthening the bond between sports and academia at Sathyabama University.

MiG-29 fighter jet crashes in Rajasthan due to technical snag, pilot safeA MiG-29 fighter jet crashed in Rajasthan's Barmer district due to a technical snag. The pilot ejected safely and there were no casualties reported.

Trinamool students' wing suspends member close to RG Kar's ex-principalThe Trinamool Chhatra Parishad suspended its member, who is also an aide of former RG Kar Medical College and Hospital principal Sandip Ghosh, following claims that he was present at the crime scene where the trainee doctor's body was found.

Religious sentiments can't be hurt: Government sources after 'Emergency' delayedThe film, in which actor-turned-politician Kangana Ranaut is playing the role of former Prime Minister Indira Gandhi, was slated to be released on September 6. However, its release date, deferred several times earlier, has been postponed again.

Class 12th Faridabad student mistaken for cow smuggler, chased for 25 km, killedFive people, identified as cow vigilantes, were arrested on charges of killing a Class 12 student, who was mistaken for a cattle smuggler in Faridabad.

iPhone 16 launch next week, here is how much it may cost in IndiaThe iPhone 16 will launch on September 9, so the next big Apple event is not too far away and will take place next week. Here is how much the iPhone 16, Plus, Pro, and Pro Max might cost in India.
Suicide bomber detonates in Kabul; 6 killed, 13 injuredThe blast took place in the southwestern Qala Bakhtiar neighbourhood in Kabul, said Khalid Zadran, spokesman for the Kabul police chief.

Weeks after music video with Salman Khan, shots fired at AP Dhillon's Canada homeThe Lawrence Bishnoi gang has claimed responsibility for the shooting outside Punjabi singer AP Dhillon's house in Canada. The attack comes weeks after Dhillon released a music video, featuring actor Salman Khan.

SA20: SEC begin title defence against MICT in opener, final at WanderersSEC will begin their SA20 title defence against MICT on January 9, 2025 at the at St George's Park to kickstart season 3 of the tournament. The final will be played at the iconic Wanderers stadium.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.
